sentences.sentence: Since then, Palestinian militias, that we can see here in a propaganda video, have suffered heavy losses, but have not stopped firing rockets at Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: The UN says it is alarmed by the escalation of violence that has already left more than 130 people dead so far this year, the overwhelming majority of them Palestinians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky is keeping the launch date of his widely anticipated counter-offensive a mystery. In a televised interview, Zelensky said his troops need more time as armoured equipment has yet to arrive he stressed a lot of lives would be lost if the defense launched a counter-attack now nevertheless it will be a quote a pleasant surprise for the russians I think you don't understand me, because it is preparing the enemy in one way or another.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: And so I would like it to be a pleasant surprise for him, and not the other way around. the epicentre of fighting on the Eastern Front. Zelensky's forces claim to have pushed Russian soldiers back some two kilometres.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_18

sentences.sentence: Today I can confirm that the UK is donating Storm Shadow missiles to Ukraine.

The donation of these weapon systems gives Ukraine the best chance to defend themselves against Russia's continued brutality, especially the deliberate targeting of Ukrainian civilian infrastructure, which is against international law. Ukraine has a right to be able to defend itself against this in Moscow Vladimir Putin spokesman poured scorn on the British announcement saying an appropriate response would be made and from our military, which will, of course, from a military point of view, make the appropriate decisions in this regard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Turkish presidential candidate Muharrem Ince says he's pulling out of Sunday's presidential election. Polling at around 2%, Ince said he didn't want to be responsible for splitting the opposition vote. The leader of the center-left Homeland Party, Ince, was one of four contenders running for president against incumbent Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Ince had faced heavy criticism for pulling crucial votes away from the six-party nation alliance that has united behind opposition leader Kamal Kilić-Doroglu.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Polls have given Kilić-Doroglu a slight lead over Erdogan although neither candidate was expected to gain more than 50% of the vote and win the election outright. Now Erdogan's opponents hope Ince's withdrawal could tip the balance in their favour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Pakistan's Supreme Court has ruled the arrest of opposition leader Imran Khan illegal in

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: a fresh twist to a political drama that unleashed a wave of violence across the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The nation's top judge said Khan's detention on Tuesday as he attended a separate hearing was contempt of court.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: Khan remains Pakistan's most popular political figure and his supporters vented their anger in several cities after his arrest, targeting government buildings and police headquarters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: At least 10 people were killed in the unrest and many more injured, either in attacks by Khan's followers or through the actions of security forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: With the country gripped by political tension, the Supreme Court urged Khan to appeal to his supporters to remain peaceful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: He is due to reappear on corruption charges in Islamabad's High Court on Friday. At least one person has been injured after a van transporting oxygen cylinders exploded in the center of Milan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: So far, there's one person injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
